about_the_game: Bring a taste of old school Vegas to Empire Bay as you cruise through the town in 2 new cars with smooth handling and timeless lines.  Vito shows his Vegas style in 2 new suits inspired by the period.
detailed_description: Bring a taste of old school Vegas to Empire Bay as you cruise through the town in 2 new cars with smooth handling and timeless lines.  Vito shows his Vegas style in 2 new suits inspired by the period.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP (SP2 or later) / Windows Vista / Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium D 3Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 3600+ (Dual core) or higher
  • RAM: 1.5 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 8GB
  • Video Card: nVidia GeForce 8600 / ATI HD2600 Pro or better
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Peripherals: Keyboard and mouse or Windows compatible gamepad
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP (SP2 or later) / Windows Vista / Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core processor
  • RAM: 2GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 10GB
  • Video Card: nVidia GeForce 9800 GTX / ATI Radeon HD 3870 or better
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
